name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Difr | Career Growth for the People

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily extract job listing details for tracking in Difr

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The job hunt sucks. Difr helps make it easier by empowering users to easily track their job applications and interviews, create AI-powered resumes, and gain valuable insights to your search.

This extension allows Difr users to quickly pull job listing data from job boards for tracking in Difr with just one click. Registration is quick and free.

Visit difr.me for information on our free and paid plans.
